title: What champions do you think will appear for the first time in LCS this year.
body: Post what champ or champs that haven't been played yet or haven't in a long time been picked competitively will appear this year! I bets on {{champion:268}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:113}}. Then post who you want to see this year. I would love to see a {{champion:82}} or a  {{champion:45}}. Would be hilarious to watch.

replies.body: {{champion:45}} showed up in the LCS last year or the year before, yo. Check the game Scara played him against C9 Hai's Kha.

I personally don't know why {{champion:113}}  isn't seen more often. With the way that some teams focus on hard engage and strong team fighting, she seems an obvious choice. {{champion:111}}  would be freaking great too. My prediction though is that we will see more {{champion:8}} maybe from calitrolz

> [{quoted}](name=BigBearBro,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jTtzmczu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-27T15:15:34.998+0000)
>
> I personally don't know why {{champion:113}}  isn't seen more often. With the way that some teams focus on hard engage and strong team fighting, she seems an obvious choice. {{champion:111}}  would be freaking great too. My prediction though is that we will see more {{champion:8}} maybe from calitrolz

i cant wait to see Calitrolz play Fizz top in LCS> watching him play it in challenger was disgusting lol.
Yeah I have to admit that Cali is the main/only reason I am on the team 8 hype train.

> [{quoted}](name=BigBearBro,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jTtzmczu,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-01-27T19:57:17.643+0000)
>
> Yeah I have to admit that Cali is the main/only reason I am on the team 8 hype train.

right? me too! i thought he was leaving and the team just kinda went to 'meh' status. but then i heard that he was able to postpone pharmacy school and all of my hype for T8 came back!

I would prefer to see more assassins.
Akali, Fiddle, Eve, Shaco (yes it might be fun), Poppy (MakNoon did this to me!), Talon.

oh because they're totally gonna pick anyone thats  not {{champion:64}} {{champion:238}} 
They basically nerf anyone who can compete with them, i dont think you're gonna see anyone else

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jTtzmczu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-27T17:35:04.369+0000)
>
> oh because they're totally gonna pick anyone thats  not {{champion:64}} {{champion:238}} 
> They basically nerf anyone who can compete with them, i dont think you're gonna see anyone else

Their nerfing Zed and buffing underplayed champs currently. I think your overreacting to a great extent.

No Kidding.  Zed and Lee's Mobility has always been high which makes them hard to keep in line.

>.< I can't imagine every LCS NA/EU/KR/CN game having a Zed/Lee Sin there are 123 champions ffs.
IDK... how about the 100 of the 130 whatever champions who are AFK in LCS?......

As a main of her, I'd love to see {{champion:133}} . The only problem with her is her AA animation at low attack speeds, the unreliability of her passive/E and the (imo) incorrect width on her Q. Other than that, she's a great pick, all around who I think is capable of some great LCS plays.
I want to see a Timbo get played in the LCS. And win.{{champion:17}}
I'd like to see  {{champion:111}}  to make an appearance

i think half of those have been picked already. reksai and azir ive seen. veigar got played in Korea as support as well. sej wont be picked until the current jungler pool expands. morde is generally just bad. id like to see Viktor, ive heard hes pretty good against Azir who is being contested more often now.
